name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Juice WRLD: Music and Emotion in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vibe with Juice WRLD’s iconic style through vibrant visuals and seamless shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the world of Juice WRLD with vibrant visuals and themes that reflect his iconic music and energy.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A clean, sleek interface inspired by Juice WRLD’s artistic style, creating a smooth browsing experience.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time with a stylish clock that complements the Juice WRLD theme.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Easily access your favorite websites with a click, making browsing more convenient.
🎮 Play Games: Enjoy exciting games directly from your browser, adding fun to your browsing experience.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Search quickly and efficiently with the built-in search bar.
🚀 More Extension: Add music-inspired features and personalization options to further enhance your browsing experience.
